ai-anya-e0301n0:0_0: Reverence to him, the Fortunate One, the Worthy One, the Perfect Sambuddha
ai-anya-e0301n0:1_0: The highest one, the ultimate one,
ai-anya-e0301n0:5_0: to the well-to-do brahmin who has come to the true teaching,
ai-anya-e0301n0:6_0: and those born in awakened among the people.
ai-anya-e0301n0:8_0: I worship that Great Seer, the Great King Dispensation.
ai-anya-e0301n0:9_0: I was born in the heart of the great mass of suffering,
ai-anya-e0301n0:11_0: This praises of the tradition by the wise,
ai-anya-e0301n0:12_0: will in this world and the next.
ai-anya-e0301n0:14_0: They drive (rebirth) up the substance of a misfortune,
ai-anya-e0301n0:15_0: they having come to me and begged the ultimate Island,
ai-anya-e0301n0:17_0: and after lifting the precious things,
ai-anya-e0301n0:18_0: would not be spoken of when poorly given to him.
ai-anya-e0301n0:20_0: there is this meaning here in its wide-breath,
ai-anya-e0301n0:23_0: Therefore at the complexion of beauty, desire for goodness,
ai-anya-e0301n0:24_0: full of calms, full of practises,
ai-anya-e0301n0:26_0: This path was destroyed by the Buddhas, and given with no profit,
ai-anya-e0301n0:27_0: I will listen to the highest deed, ~ (saying):
